text:
Mike Rounds (born October 24, 1954) is the junior United States Senator from South Dakota. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 2015.
Rounds was born on October 24, 1954 in Huron, South Dakota. He graduated from the South Dakota State University. He is married to Jean Rounds. They have four children.
In February 15, 2018 Mike Round interview with Martha MacCallum on Fox News channel, he said about a bipartisan Immigration fail to move forward in the Senate.
